relapse.note: If the setback exceeds your accumulated days, the counter will be set to zero.

emotionLogger.title: How do you feel today?
emotionLogger.alreadyLogged: ‚úì You've already logged your emotions today at {{time}}
emotionLogger.selectLimit: Select up to 3 emotions that best describe how you feel
emotionLogger.maxEmotions: You can only select a maximum of 3 emotions

socialStats.title: Epidemiological Data

successRateTooltip.title: What does this mean?
successRateTooltip.description: This percentage represents the proportion of people who, having reached the same point as you, manage to maintain permanent abstinence.
successRateTooltip.source: Based on longitudinal studies on nicotine cessation.

socialStats.description: of people who reach day {{days}} maintain permanent abstinence
socialStats.source: Data based on longitudinal studies on nicotine cessation (Hughes et al., 2014; West & Brown, 2013). The probability of success increases exponentially with each time milestone reached.

virtualRewards.title: Emotional Progress System

tooltip.title: How does it work?
tooltip.description: This system analyzes your daily emotional records to identify progress patterns and award recognition badges.
tooltip.purpose: Motivate consistency in emotional recording and celebrate improvements in your psychological well-being during the vaping cessation process.
tooltip.science: Based on cognitive-behavioral therapy and studies on emotional self-regulation in addiction cessation processes (Marlatt & Gordon, 1985).

virtualRewards.motivationalMessage: üß† Your progress is based on real emotional changes, not just time elapsed. Each unlocked state reflects an authentic transformation in your well-being.
virtualRewards.registrationInfo: üìä Record your emotions regularly to unlock emotional states. You have {{count}} records so far.

dorsal.name: Dorsal state
dorsal.description: Survival. The system is collapsed, disconnected from the world.

dorsalAwakening.name: Dorsal awakening
dorsalAwakening.description: First movements. Something begins to emerge from lethargy.

sympatheticTransition.name: Sympathetic transition
sympatheticTransition.description: Hyperactivation calms down. Reduced reactivity to the environment.

emergingBalance.name: Emerging balance
emergingBalance.description: Serenity as a new base. Systems are regulating.

earlyVentral.name: Early ventral
earlyVentral.description: Authentic connection. Calm and vitality dance together.

matureVentral.name: Mature ventral
matureVentral.description: Emotional flexibility. Fluid navigation between positive states.

totalPresence.name: Total presence
totalPresence.description: Full ventral state. The radiant calm that embraces joy.

predictiveAnalysis.title: Predictive Analysis

tooltip.title: What is this?
tooltip.description: An analysis based on your emotional patterns that predicts possible challenges and opportunities in your process.
tooltip.note: All predictions are indicative and improve with more data.

notEnoughData.title: Predictive Analysis
notEnoughData.description: Record your emotions for at least 3 days to get personalized analysis and useful predictions.

predictiveAnalysis.disclaimer: üß† This analysis is based on your unique patterns and improves with more data. All predictions are indicative and completely private.

healthTracker.title: Your Health Recovery

tooltip.title: Medical monitoring
tooltip.description: This system monitors your physical recovery based on medical research on vaping cessation.
tooltip.detail: Each category shows your real progress according to the time elapsed since you quit vaping.

healthTracker.dayProgress: Day {{days}} - Progress based on medical studies on post-vaping recovery

tooltip.function: Monitors the recovery of your lung function after quitting vaping.
tooltip.sense: The lungs progressively recover by eliminating toxins and regenerating tissues.
tooltip.science: Based on post-cessation lung function studies (Respiratory Medicine, 2023).

tooltip.function: Evaluates the improvement in your circulatory system and heart health.
tooltip.sense: The heart and blood vessels benefit immediately from eliminating nicotine.
tooltip.science: Based on research on cardiovascular recovery (JACC, 2022).

tooltip.function: Tracks the recovery of your liver function and metabolism.
tooltip.sense: The liver processes toxins better and reverses damage caused by vaping chemicals.
tooltip.science: Based on studies of hepatic toxicology and recovery (Hepatology, 2021).

tooltip.function: Monitors improvement in skin hydration and tear function.
tooltip.sense: Skin and eyes recover their natural hydration by eliminating vaping irritants.
tooltip.science: Based on clinical dermatology and ophthalmology (JAMA Dermatology, 2022).

tooltip.function: Evaluates your neurological recovery and psychological well-being.
tooltip.sense: The brain gradually adapts without nicotine, improving mood and concentration.
tooltip.science: Based on neuroplasticity and addiction studies (Nature Neuroscience, 2023).

progressCard.basedOnStudies: Data based on recent medical studies
progressCard.progressBasedOn: Real progress based on {{days}} days of recovery
progressCard.chartNote: Chart based on medical research on post-vaping recovery

epicQuests.title: Body Memory and Neuroplasticity

explanation.question: Why repeat each situation several times?
explanation.answer: When you overcome a difficult situation without vaping 3 times (or as required), that experience is recorded in your body and brain memory as a new neurological pattern.
explanation.detail: Your nervous system learns that it can live that experience and enjoy it even more without the need for nicotine. Repetition consolidates new neural connections that replace addictive associations.
explanation.science: Neuroplasticity in action: Each time you repeat an experience without vaping, you strengthen the neural networks of autonomy and weaken those of dependence. After completing a feat, that situation will no longer be a "trigger" but a demonstration of your new psychophysical cartography.

habitsManager.title: ‚ö° Power - Scientific Habits
habitsManager.subtitle: Validated routines to overcome nicotine withdrawal

tooltip.title: Science-Based Habits
tooltip.description: Scientifically validated routines to overcome nicotine withdrawal. The more you activate, the stronger your foundation.
tooltip.effectiveness: Effectiveness increases significantly if you combine 3 or more routines (Hajek et al., 2019).

stats.excellent: üéâ Excellent! With {{count}} active habits you have a solid foundation for success
stats.tip: üí° Tip: Only activate those habits you want to implement. Don't overwhelm yourself, just the ones you think can help you

tooltip.title: How does it work?
tooltip.description: Mark as completed each day you achieve the habit. You can only mark once per day.
tooltip.recountSocial: For social commitment: 1 day per week = 100% completed
tooltip.recountOthers: Resets every 7 days, but keeps track of previous weeks.

habitTracker.medalObtained: You've earned a medal for consolidating this scientific habit

successKey.title: üí° Key to Success
successKey.description: All habits are validated for nicotine abstinence in vapers. Effectiveness increases if you combine ‚â•3 routines.
successKey.source: Source: Hajek et al., 2019 - Specific studies on vaping cessation

donation.subtext: Your support allows me to continue improving and maintaining this app completely free for the entire community.

dataManagement.info: Information: All data is stored locally on your device. Export your data regularly as a backup.

about.title: ‚ÑπÔ∏è About the Application
about.name: UMBRAL - Vape Free
about.version: Version 2.1 - With advanced health tracking and donation support
about.purpose: Developed to accompany you in your vaping cessation process
about.disclaimer: Health recovery data is based on scientific studies on the effects of quitting vaping and smoking. Values are estimates and may vary for each person.
about.medicalWarning: Medical Notice: This application does not substitute professional medical advice. If you experience severe symptoms during your vaping cessation process, consult a healthcare professional.

panicButton.title: Anti-Craving Protocol
panicButton.instructions: Follow these steps in order. Each one will help you overcome the craving:

water.title: Drink Water
water.description: Take a full glass of water

manipulate.title: Manipulate Object
manipulate.description: Use pen, coin or any object in your hands

completed.title: üéâ Protocol Completed!
completed.message: You've overcome the craving. Your willpower has strengthened.

panicButton.reminder: üí° Remember: Cravings last a maximum of 5 minutes. You're already closer to overcoming it.
